question:
Mrs. Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day next summer.
write a letter to Mrs. barrettes
your letter suggest how you could help her in her home
Say why you would like to do this work
Explain when you will and will not be available
text: I am writing in connection with your advertisement. Since I have many experiences in the home setting and caring it is in my interest to find ways to improve my résumé with working for an English-speaking person.

I would like to mention the things I am able to do in the house. I provide professional and friendly help with day-to-day domestic tasks such as doing laundry, preparing meals, companionship and also running errands. In addition, I would even shop for you whenever is necessary.

The main reason why I am into this job is that it helps me to take away the stress and anxiety of the world by taking care of another human being. Another viable reason is that I am multilingual and I have worked for three French and for German women and now I would like to work for an English one.

Since I am working in a lovely house now I'm not available right away but fortunately, my contract is due next spring. So I am able to work for you from next summer and I can do six days a week each day for at least three hours if you wish.
This is all I would like to share with you. Thank you for taking the time to read this letter.
